text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This obsoletes IRM 1.4.30, Resource Guide for Managers, Monitoring Internal Control Planned Corrective Actions

The material in IRM 1.4.30, Resource Guide for Managers, Monitoring Internal Control Planned Corrective Actions is no longer effective because guidance has been incorporated into IRM 1.29.1, Audit Coordination Process - Authorities and Responsibilities.
IRM 1.4.30, Resource Guide for Managers, Monitoring Internal Control Planned Corrective Actions is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.
All IRS Executives, Managers, and JAMES Audit Coordinators
